name: Color Crown
description:
Play Color Crown the classic and addictive game for FREE,
collect 3 stars and clear a level.Don't miss out on this relaxing
game, wait for the right time aim and shoot, avoid the colors or use them
to your advantage, the choice is yours. Train your brain
to aim & shoot at the correct time.

Are you ready for this epic color shooter !
Get the new game now for FREE !

Avoid the color wheel, color line and a lot more to get to your goal.
In color crown the  color palette can be you friend or foe the decision is yours to make!

In Color Crown you Aim & Shoot, there are a lot of ways to finish a level, can you
find one. Test your skills, perfect for everyone to enjoy!

Color Crown is a great shooting game and a puzzle playground.

Put your skills to test, find a way to the stars. Use everything
you have, some levels might seem difficult but there is a way 
for everything.Remember color crown is a logic puzzle.

If the levels get to hard there is always the upgrades shop.
Upgrade your speed, Upgrade your ball count. More balls you 
have the more the chances to completing the level.

Now you don't need to be just a ball anymore, change yourself
to look something else.

FEATURES:
100 Level and many more to come.
Relaxing Visuals.
Cool Sounds.
Upgrade System.
Skins.
